DOC.brief_summary: Several observational studies have evaluated the comparative treatment costs associated with each agent, particularly those within the anti-TNF class, but few have evaluated the impact of therapy compliance, persistence, treatment patterns on patient reported outcomes, healthcare utilization and costs, using a provider database. This study is designed to fill in this information gap.
DOC.brief_title: Impact Of RA Therapy Compliance On Patient-Reported Outcomes
DOC.criteria: Adults with moderate to severe RA who are currently using a DMARD Psoriatic Arthritis (PsA), Psoriasis (PsO), SSystemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE), NonDisease modifying antirheumatic disease (nonDMARD) use
